name: Aatrox
description: Aatrox, the Darkin Blade, is a fallen god-warrior who wields a massive sword to annihilate his foes.

name: Ahri
description: Ahri, the Nine-Tailed Fox, is a charming mage who uses her allure and magic to manipulate and damage enemies.

name: Akali
description: Akali, the Rogue Assassin, is a nimble fighter who strikes swiftly and disappears into the shadows.

name: Alistar
description: Alistar, the Minotaur, is a mighty tank who uses his strength to protect allies and disrupt enemies.

name: Amumu
description: Amumu, the Sad Mummy, is a melancholic tank who curses and entangles his foes.

name: Anivia
description: Anivia, the Cryophoenix, is an ancient ice bird who controls the power of frost to hinder and damage enemies.

name: Annie
description: Annie, the Dark Child, is a young mage with pyromantic abilities and a fiery bear companion named Tibbers.

name: Aphelios
description: Aphelios, the Weapon of the Faithful, is a marksman who wields an array of moonstone weapons.

name: Ashe
description: Ashe, the Frost Archer, is a skilled archer who commands ice to slow and damage her enemies.

name: Aurelion Sol
description: Aurelion Sol, the Star Forger, is a celestial dragon who creates and manipulates stars to devastate foes.

name: Azir
description: Azir, the Emperor of the Sands, is a resurrected ruler who commands sand soldiers to attack his enemies.

name: Bard
description: Bard, the Wandering Caretaker, is a cosmic guardian who uses mystical powers to aid allies and hinder foes.

name: Blitzcrank
description: Blitzcrank, the Great Steam Golem, is a mechanical behemoth known for his rocket grab and crowd control.

name: Brand
description: Brand, the Burning Vengeance, is a fire-wielding mage who engulfs his enemies in flames.

name: Braum
description: Braum, the Heart of the Freljord, is a jovial strongman who uses his shield to protect allies.

name: Caitlyn
description: Caitlyn, the Sheriff of Piltover, is a sharpshooting marksman known for her precision and traps.

name: Camille
description: Camille, the Steel Shadow, is a deadly operative with hextech augmentations and sharp blades.

name: Cassiopeia
description: Cassiopeia, the Serpent's Embrace, is a venomous mage who petrifies and poisons her enemies

name: Cho'Gath
description: Cho'Gath, the Terror of the Void, is a massive creature who grows in size and power as he devours enemies.

name: Corki
description: Corki, the Daring Bombardier, is a Yordle pilot who flies a heavily-armed aircraft to engage his foes.

name: Darius
description: Darius, the Hand of Noxus, is a brutal warrior who wields a giant axe to execute his enemies.

name: Diana
description: Diana, Scorn of the Moon, is a lunar warrior who uses her crescent blade to strike swiftly in battle.

name: Dr. Mundo
description: Dr. Mundo, the Madman of Zaun, is a chaotic, unkillable fighter who regenerates health rapidly.

name: Draven
description: Draven, the Glorious Executioner, is a flamboyant marksman who throws spinning axes to dominate opponents.

name: Ekko
description: Ekko, the Boy Who Shattered Time, is a prodigy who manipulates time to outmaneuver and strike his enemies.

name: Elise
description: Elise, the Spider Queen, is a dark sorceress who shifts between human and spider form to ensnare her prey.

name: Evelynn
description: Evelynn, Agony's Embrace, is a seductive assassin who stalks her prey and unleashes devastating magic.

name: Ezreal
description: Ezreal, the Prodigal Explorer, is an adventurous marksman who fires mystical energy shots with pinpoint accuracy.

name: Fiddlesticks
description: Fiddlesticks, the Ancient Fear, is a terrifying scarecrow who strikes fear into the hearts of his enemies.

name: Fiora
description: Fiora, the Grand Duelist, is a skilled sword fighter who excels in one-on-one combat with deadly precision.

name: Fizz
description: Fizz, the Tidal Trickster, is a playful yet deadly aquatic assassin who summons creatures from the depths.

name: Galio
description: Galio, the Colossus, is a giant stone sentinel who protects allies by absorbing magical attacks.

name: Gangplank
description: Gangplank, the Saltwater Scourge, is a pirate king who combines pistols, swords, and barrels of explosives.

name: Garen
description: Garen, the Might of Demacia, is a steadfast warrior who strikes fearlessly with his spinning sword.

name: Gnar
description: Gnar, the Missing Link, is a Yordle who transforms into a powerful beast when enraged.

name: Gragas
description: Gragas, the Rabble Rouser, is a jovial brawler who uses his body and barrels to wreak havoc on the battlefield.

name: Graves
description: Graves, the Outlaw, is a rugged marksman who wields a powerful shotgun and prefers close-range combat.

name: Gwen
description: Gwen, the Hallowed Seamstress, is a magical doll who wields giant scissors to carve through enemies.

name: Hecarim
description: Hecarim, the Shadow of War, is a spectral centaur who charges into battle with unstoppable force.

name: Heimerdinger
description: Heimerdinger, the Revered Inventor, is a Yordle genius who builds turrets and contraptions to control fights.

name: Illaoi
description: Illaoi, the Kraken Priestess, is a powerful brawler who summons tentacles to pummel her enemies.

name: Irelia
description: Irelia, the Blade Dancer, is a nimble warrior who controls blades with precise movements.

name: Ivern
description: Ivern, the Green Father, is a gentle forest guardian who aids allies and befriends jungle creatures.

name: Janna
description: Janna, the Storm's Fury, is a wind goddess who protects and empowers allies with healing and shields.

name: Jarvan IV
description: Jarvan IV, the Exemplar of Demacia, is a noble warrior who commands the battlefield with his lance.

name: Jax
description: Jax, Grandmaster at Arms, is a skilled warrior who fights with unorthodox weapons and unmatched agility.

name: Jayce
description: Jayce, the Defender of Tomorrow, is a tech-savvy warrior who can switch between ranged and melee combat.

name: Jhin
description: Jhin, the Virtuoso, is a meticulous marksman who crafts each shot as a deadly work of art.

name: Jinx
description: Jinx, the Loose Cannon, is a manic marksman who revels in chaos, armed with a vast arsenal of explosive weapons.

name: Kai'Sa
description: Kai'Sa, Daughter of the Void, is a skilled fighter who harnesses void energy to survive and thrive.

name: Kalista
description: Kalista, the Spear of Vengeance, is a spectral huntress bound to serve those wronged, wielding her ghostly spears.

name: Karma
description: Karma, the Enlightened One, is a powerful spirit guide who balances aggression and support in combat.

name: Karthus
description: Karthus, the Deathsinger, is a haunting mage who uses necromantic power to destroy his enemies from beyond.

name: Kassadin
description: Kassadin, the Void Walker, is a mysterious figure who harnesses void energy to counter mages and blink through fights.

name: Katarina
description: Katarina, the Sinister Blade, is a swift assassin who unleashes a storm of daggers upon her enemies.

name: Kayle
description: Kayle, the Righteous, is a celestial warrior who ascends to greatness, raining down holy justice on her foes.

name: Kayn
description: Kayn, the Shadow Reaper, is a scythe-wielding warrior who chooses between shadow and darkin powers.

name: Kennen
description: Kennen, the Heart of the Tempest, is a ninja Yordle who commands lightning to stun and strike his enemies.

name: Kha'Zix
description: Kha'Zix, the Voidreaver, is an evolving predator who thrives in isolation, preying on the unsuspecting.

name: Kindred
description: Kindred, the Eternal Hunters, represent death itself, embodying both the Lamb and the Wolf.

name: Kled
description: Kled, the Cantankerous Cavalier, is a loud-mouthed Noxian warrior who rides his trusty mount, Skaarl.

name: Kog'Maw
description: Kog'Maw, the Mouth of the Abyss, is a ravenous void creature who spits corrosive acid at his foes.

name: LeBlanc
description: LeBlanc, the Deceiver, is a master illusionist who manipulates reality to bewilder and harm her enemies.

name: Lee Sin
description: Lee Sin, the Blind Monk, is a martial artist who uses his senses to perform precise, devastating attacks.

name: Leona
description: Leona, the Radiant Dawn, is a sun warrior who protects her allies with her shield and sunlight-based abilities.

name: Lillia
description: Lillia, the Bashful Bloom, is a magical fawn who uses her nature powers to spread dreams and protect the forest.

name: Lissandra
description: Lissandra, the Ice Witch, commands the powers of frost to freeze and shatter her foes.

name: Lucian
description: Lucian, the Purifier, is a vengeful marksman who wields twin pistols to hunt down dark forces.

name: Lulu
description: Lulu, the Fae Sorceress, is a whimsical Yordle who uses her magic to transform allies and disrupt enemies.

name: Lux
description: Lux, the Lady of Luminosity, is a light mage who dazzles and damages enemies with radiant spells.

name: Malphite
description: Malphite, Shard of the Monolith, is a massive stone creature who uses brute force to crush his enemies.

name: Malzahar
description: Malzahar, the Prophet of the Void, summons voidlings and powerful spells to control the battlefield.

name: Maokai
description: Maokai, the Twisted Treant, is a tree spirit who protects nature by trapping and controlling his enemies.

name: Master Yi
description: Master Yi, the Wuju Bladesman, is a master swordsman who moves with blinding speed to cut down his foes.

name: Miss Fortune
description: Miss Fortune, the Bounty Hunter, is a pirate marksman who uses her pistols to deal heavy area damage.

name: Mordekaiser
description: Mordekaiser, the Iron Revenant, is a fearsome necromancer who commands the dead and wields heavy armor.

name: Morgana
description: Morgana, the Fallen, is a dark sorceress who binds and punishes enemies with dark magic.

name: Nami
description: Nami, the Tidecaller, is an aquatic mage who supports allies with healing and control spells.

name: Nasus
description: Nasus, the Curator of the Sands, is an ancient guardian with immense power that grows over time.

name: Nautilus
description: Nautilus, the Titan of the Depths, is a hulking tank who anchors enemies and controls the battlefield.

name: Neeko
description: Neeko, the Curious Chameleon, is a shape-shifting mage who tricks and deceives her opponents.

name: Nidalee
description: Nidalee, the Bestial Huntress, is a shapeshifter who alternates between human and cougar forms.

name: Nilah
description: Nilah, the Joy Unbound, is a fierce fighter with a mastery over water, channeling its power in combat.

name: Nocturne
description: Nocturne, the Eternal Nightmare, is a dark figure that strikes fear into his enemies, bringing shadow and terror.

name: Nunu & Willump
description: Nunu and Willump, the Boy and His Yeti, are an adventurous duo who conquer the Freljord with teamwork and magic.

name: Olaf
description: Olaf, the Berserker, is a powerful warrior who grows stronger the closer he gets to death.

name: Orianna
description: Orianna, the Lady of Clockwork, controls a magical orb to protect and devastate from a distance.

name: Ornn
description: Ornn, the Fire Below the Mountain, is a demigod blacksmith who crafts items and controls fire to battle foes.

name: Pantheon
description: Pantheon, the Unbreakable Spear, is a fearless warrior who hurls his spear and leaps into battle with godlike might.

name: Poppy
description: Poppy, Keeper of the Hammer, is a small but mighty Yordle who wields a giant hammer to defend justice.

name: Pyke
description: Pyke, the Bloodharbor Ripper, is a deadly underwater assassin who emerges to take revenge on those who wronged him.

name: Qiyana
description: Qiyana, Empress of the Elements, is a ruthless royalty who manipulates her environment to deadly effect.

name: Quinn
description: Quinn, Demacia's Wings, is a skilled ranger who fights alongside her loyal hawk, Valor, to defeat enemies.

name: Rakan
description: Rakan, the Charmer, is a nimble support who uses charm and acrobatics to protect allies and control foes.

name: Rammus
description: Rammus, the Armordillo, is a mysterious armored creature who rolls into battle with unmatched resilience.

name: Rek'Sai
description: Rek'Sai, the Void Burrower, is a predatory void creature who tunnels underground to ambush her enemies.

name: Rell
description: Rell, the Iron Maiden, is a powerful metal manipulator who uses her armor to control and disable enemies.

name: Renekton
description: Renekton, the Butcher of the Sands, is a wrathful warrior who wields a massive blade and thrives in close combat.

name: Rengar
description: Rengar, the Pridestalker, is a ruthless predator who stalks his prey from the shadows and strikes with deadly precision.

name: Riven
description: Riven, the Exile, is a master swordswoman who fights with broken blades and unmatched speed and agility.

name: Rumble
description: Rumble, the Mechanized Menace, is a Yordle engineer who pilots a powerful mech to burn down his enemies.

name: Ryze
description: Ryze, the Rune Mage, is a master of arcane power who wields ancient runes to reshape reality.

name: Samira
description: Samira, the Desert Rose, is a stylish gunner who combines ranged and melee attacks to devastate her foes.

name: Sejuani
description: Sejuani, Fury of the North, is a ferocious warrior who rides a giant boar and uses ice to subdue her enemies.

name: Senna
description: Senna, the Redeemer, is a spectral marksman who fights the Mist and brings light to those in darkness.

name: Seraphine
description: Seraphine, the Starry-Eyed Songstress, is a pop star who inspires and empowers her allies through music.

name: Sett
description: Sett, the Boss, is a powerful brawler who thrives in close combat, delivering crushing punches and throws.

name: Shaco
description: Shaco, the Demon Jester, is a twisted assassin who uses stealth and traps to ambush and terrorize his foes.

name: Shen
description: Shen, the Eye of Twilight, is a stoic warrior who uses his spirit blade to shield and protect his allies.

name: Shyvana
description: Shyvana, the Half-Dragon, is a fierce warrior who transforms into a dragon to unleash fiery devastation.

name: Singed
description: Singed, the Mad Chemist, is a crazed scientist who uses poisonous gas to hinder and harm his enemies.

name: Sion
description: Sion, the Undead Juggernaut, is a hulking, undead warrior who charges fearlessly into the fray.

name: Sivir
description: Sivir, the Battle Mistress, is a skilled mercenary who wields a deadly boomerang blade in battle.

name: Skarner
description: Skarner, the Crystal Vanguard, is a noble creature from the Shuriman desert who uses crystal spires for power.

name: Sona
description: Sona, Maven of the Strings, is a musician who uses harmonious melodies to heal and enhance allies.

name: Soraka
description: Soraka, the Starchild, is a celestial healer who sacrifices her health to save her allies.

name: Swain
description: Swain, the Noxian Grand General, is a powerful strategist who uses dark magic to control the battlefield.

name: Sylas
description: Sylas, the Unshackled, is a revolutionary mage who steals his enemies' powers to fuel his rebellion.

name: Syndra
description: Syndra, the Dark Sovereign, is a powerful mage who manipulates spheres of dark energy to devastate her foes.

name: Tahm Kench
description: Tahm Kench, the River King, is a monstrous figure who devours his enemies and protects his allies.

name: Taliyah
description: Taliyah, the Stoneweaver, is a young mage who commands the earth to reshape the battlefield.

name: Talon
description: Talon, the Blade's Shadow, is a master assassin who strikes from the shadows with deadly precision.

name: Taric
description: Taric, the Shield of Valoran, is a celestial protector who uses the power of the stars to shield his allies.

name: Teemo
description: Teemo, the Swift Scout, is a Yordle marksman who uses stealth and traps to surprise his enemies.

name: Thresh
description: Thresh, the Chain Warden, is a spectral jailer who uses his chains to control and capture his enemies.

name: Tristana
description: Tristana, the Yordle Gunner, is a cheerful marksman who wields a powerful cannon to blast her foes.

name: Trundle
description: Trundle, the Troll King, is a towering troll who smashes his foes with icy clubs and drains their defenses.

name: Tryndamere
description: Tryndamere, the Barbarian King, is a fearsome warrior who becomes more deadly as his rage builds.

name: Twisted Fate
description: Twisted Fate, the Card Master, is a gambler and sorcerer who uses enchanted cards to control the battlefield.

name: Twitch
description: Twitch, the Plague Rat, is a sneaky marksman who spreads disease and chaos wherever he goes.

name: Udyr
description: Udyr, the Spirit Walker, is a warrior who channels animal spirits to empower his attacks.

name: Urgot
description: Urgot, the Dreadnought, is a terrifying amalgamation of flesh and metal who shreds enemies with his machine parts.

name: Varus
description: Varus, the Arrow of Retribution, is a corrupted archer who channels dark magic through his bow.

name: Vayne
description: Vayne, the Night Hunter, is a relentless marksman who hunts down the unnatural with her crossbow.

name: Veigar
description: Veigar, the Tiny Master of Evil, is a small yet powerful mage who revels in dark magic.

name: Vel'Koz
description: Vel'Koz, the Eye of the Void, is a curious creature from the void who dissects and studies his enemies.

name: Vex
description: Vex, the Gloomist, is a melancholy Yordle mage who uses shadows to disrupt and demoralize her enemies.

name: Vi
description: Vi, the Piltover Enforcer, is a tough brawler who uses massive gauntlets to deliver punishing blows.

name: Viego
description: Viego, the Ruined King, is a spectral warrior who takes control of fallen enemies to fight in their place.

name: Viktor
description: Viktor, the Machine Herald, is a scientist who augments himself with technology to achieve perfection.

name: Vladimir
description: Vladimir, the Crimson Reaper, is a powerful mage who drains the life force from his enemies to sustain himself.

name: Volibear
description: Volibear, the Relentless Storm, is a demigod bear who commands the power of thunder to crush his enemies.

name: Warwick
description: Warwick, the Uncaged Wrath of Zaun, is a fearsome beast with a taste for blood and relentless tracking abilities.

name: Wukong
description: Wukong, the Monkey King, is a cunning fighter who uses trickery and a staff to outmaneuver his opponents.

name: Xayah
description: Xayah, the Rebel, is a deadly marksman who uses feathered blades to strike and outplay her foes.

name: Xerath
description: Xerath, the Magus Ascendant, is a powerful being of arcane energy who unleashes destructive spells from afar.

name: Xin Zhao
description: Xin Zhao, the Seneschal of Demacia, is a loyal warrior who excels in close-range combat with his spear.

name: Yasuo
description: Yasuo, the Unforgiven, is a master swordsman who wields the wind to dash through and strike down enemies.

name: Yone
description: Yone, the Unforgotten, is a dual-wielding warrior who has returned from the spirit world to seek redemption.

name: Yorick
description: Yorick, Shepherd of Souls, is a spectral gravekeeper who summons the dead to aid him in battle.

name: Yuumi
description: Yuumi, the Magical Cat, is a playful support who attaches to allies, shielding and healing them from safety.

name: Zac
description: Zac, the Secret Weapon, is an elastic creature who bounces around the battlefield, disrupting foes.

name: Zed
description: Zed, the Master of Shadows, is a deadly assassin who manipulates shadows to strike and evade his enemies.

name: Zeri
description: Zeri, the Spark of Zaun, is a lightning-charged marksman who zips around the battlefield, firing electrified shots.

name: Ziggs
description: Ziggs, the Hexplosives Expert, is a Yordle bomb maker who uses explosives to create chaos on the battlefield.

name: Zilean
description: Zilean, the Chronokeeper, is a wise mage who bends time to protect allies and disrupt enemies.

name: Zoe
description: Zoe, the Aspect of Twilight, is a mischievous celestial who uses portals and spells to confound her foes.

name: Zyra
description: Zyra, Rise of the Thorns, is a dangerous plant mage who summons deadly flora to ensnare and harm her enemies.
